name: Online Class and Exam Scheduling System profile_update.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Online Class and Exam Scheduling System Online Class and Exam Scheduling System 1.0"]
description: Online Class and Exam Scheduling System是一个在线课程和考试安排系统。Online Class and Exam Scheduling System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/Scheduling/pages/profile_update.php中参数username缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://code-projects.org/
